Name: Helm Memory Core
Details: The Helm Memory Core is a Star League library included in a much larger storage facility on the planet Helm. The memory core was discovered by Grayson Carlyle and the Gray Death Legion in 3028, and quickly copied and disseminated throughout the Inner Sphere. In addition to the technical information contained within, the Helm Memory Core enabled the translation of many previously indecipherable Star League documents, sparking a technological renaissances.
